entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as someone who is hard to convince people is back.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person whose rumor-mongering is being suppressed by the Ministry.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The governing body of the wizarding community, described as leaning heavily on the Daily Prophet not to report any rumors.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: A newspaper that is being influenced by the Ministry to suppress rumors.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, described as using the Imperius Curse.

entities.name: imperius curse
entities.description: A spell used by the Death Eaters to control others.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, described as looking around at a group of people.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: A family mentioned in the conversation.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who is part of a group letting people know that Voldemort is back.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: A member of the Weasley family and part of the group letting people know about Voldemort's return.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: A person who is part of the group letting people know that Voldemort is back.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A member of the group letting people know about Voldemort's return.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person who is part of the group letting people know that Voldemort is back.

relationships.description: Sirius is associated with Voldemort, as he is part of a group letting people know that Voldemort is back.
